mapper.sql: id, is_delete, gmt_create, gmt_modified, third_party_name_id, field, feld_type, field_name, field_note
mapper.select: select ORDINAL_POSITION fNumber, COLUMN_NAME fColumn, DATA_TYPE fDatatype, case when COLUMN_COMMENT='' then COLUMN_NAME else COLUMN_COMMENT END fRemark from (select * from information_schema.`COLUMNS` t1 where TABLE_SCHEMA=database() and TABLE_NAME =#{tableName}) t2 order by fNumber
mapper.insert:
insert into ms_third_party_table_fields ( third_party_name_id, field, feld_type, field_note) values
( #{item.thirdPartyNameId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.field,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.feldType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fieldNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

id,

update ms_third_party_table_fields
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
third_party_name_id = #{thirdPartyNameId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
